price: ߣߴߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߡߊ߲߬ߕߙߐ ߓߐ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߲߬ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߞߐ߫ ߸ ߊߟߎ߫ ߝߊ߲߬ ߞߋߟߋ߲ ߘߌ߫ ߜߙߊ߬ߢߐ߲߯ ߞߍ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߌߞߘߐ߫
arabic: ثُمَّ إِذَا كَشَفَ ٱلضُّرَّ عَنكُمۡ إِذَا فَرِيقٞ مِّنكُم بِرَبِّهِمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: thumma idhā kashafa al-ḍura ʿankum idhā farīqun minkum birabbihim yush'rikūna
